subject: Concussions
Football
lead_paragraph: Domenik Hixon, who filled in for Plaxico Burress on Saturday, gave a performance that was another step toward his being recognized as a receiver, not as a return specialist.
snippet: Domenik Hixon, who filled in for Plaxico Burress on Saturday, gave a performance that was another step toward his being recognized as a receiver, not as a return specialist.
